entry.title: Eastern wind
entry.content:
An instrumental single inspired by Eastern sounds.

This track represents a humble attempt to incorporate eastern vibe into a sad slow tempo beat using minimalistic approach (only 4 instruments).

Gear used:

  • Reaper (DAW)
  • Arturia Pigments (VSTi, synthesized Koto sounds)
  • Arturia Pigments (VSTi, synthesized Strings & Winds sounds)
  • Native Instruments Komplete (YANGQIN, chinese strings instrument sampler)
  • Steven Slate Drums (VSTi, drum sounds)
  • Native Instruments Komplete S49 MKII (midi-keyboard)
entry.summary: An instrumental single inspired by Eastern sounds.

entry.title: Broken Galaxy
entry.content:
A synth-driven journey through dark space.

This instrumental track was inspired by the hanging dissonances produced by one of synthesizersâ€”tones that felt like a spacecraft traveling through the cracks of time and space.

Gear used:

  • Reaper (DAW)
  • Arturia Pigments (VSTi, synth sounds)
  • Steven Slate Drums (VSTi, drum sounds)
  • Fractal Audio AX8 (guitar processor)
  • Schecter Extreme Passive 6 (electric guitar)
  • Native Instruments Komplete S49 MKII (midi-keyboard)
entry.summary: A synth-driven journey through dark space.

entry.title: Unconsciousness
entry.content:
A minimalistic instrumental single defined by mix of a piano and a synth chaos.

In this track I looked for a way to integrate the beauty of the piano sounds with a booming synth bass and a chaotical synth vibe. The differences of the instruments are defined in a way to show the chaotical nature of thoughts.

Gear used:

  • Reaper (DAW)
  • Arturia Pigments (VSTi, synth sounds)
  • Numa Player (VSTi, synth sounds)
  • Steven Slate Drums (VSTi, drum sounds)
  • Native Instruments Komplete S49 MKII (midi-keyboard)
entry.summary: A mix of a piano and a synth chaos to reflect the unordered nature of thoughts process.
